product_name: Roxy Syncro 2/2 SS Spring Wetsuit - Women's
long_description: Slip into the shapely and stylish Roxy Syncro 2/2mm Spring Wetsuit to stay warm while paddling, surfing or boating, and enjoy the warmth of 2mm neoprene. 2mm neoprene in body and sleeves means this design is ideal for water play in mild water temperatures. Stretchy 2/2mm neoprene forms to your body for a flexible, comfortable fit; you'll enjoy freedom of motion without chafing thanks to the glued and blind-stitched seams. Rear zipper secures the fit and features an extra-long zipper pull; soft neoprene gusset prevents zipper abrasion. 2 rip-and-stick tabs at neck seal securely. Front panel repels wind and water to guard your core insulation. Hand wash the Roxy Syncro 2/2mm Spring Setsuit in cold water, drip dry out of sun and store in a cool, dry place.
short_description: Slip into the shapely and stylish Roxy Syncro 2/2mm Spring Wetsuit to stay warm while paddling, surfing or boating, and enjoy the warmth of 2mm neoprene.
